answers.author: Larry Paine
answers.text:
The session on talking to your police chief and fire chief was excellent.  The speaker told about how to use call data for each service to determine whether additional staffing or additional equipment is needed.

answers.text:
Social Media was helpful. I also enjoyed the session on Letters to the Editor.

author: Unknown
text: I hope you all had a great time at the conference. What sessions did you think we most helpful for managing your small community?
title: Small Community Management and the ICMA Annual Conference
